name: Carlos Solano
bio: Carlos Solano, a 29-year-old attacking midfielder from Costa Rica, dazzles on the field with his quick dribbling and pinpoint passes. Known for his tactical intelligence and relentless energy, he often orchestrates plays that leave the opposition guessing. A fan favorite at Tierra Alta FC, his passion for sustainability reflects both in his game and outside, making him a symbol of the team's green values.
